title: Change collision detection
content:
Service Managementâ€™s change collision detection feature can help you detect and avoid collisions with other changes. In outline, for the current change that you are working on, and depending how you configure it, the feature enables detection of the following collisions:

  • With all changes matching specified parameters, and
  • With changes affecting the same device

Related topics

  • How change collision detection works
  • How to enable change collision detection
